topic.title: Discharge Letter Issued Date (Mental Health and Community Care)
topic.shortdesc: The Discharge Letter Issued Date (Mental Health and Community Care) is the date when the Discharge Letter was issued to the PATIENT by the Mental Health Service or Community Health Service.
